content: So remember, all neurologists and prescribers can prescribe for MS -- for gait deficit due to MS. We have a booth there and really provide our clinical data, our real-world data and MS, but also talk to them about our platform right now in the U.S., how easy it is for any rehab hospital or clinic for their PTs to get trained up and really educate them so that they understand that PoNS is an effective treatment for gait deficit due to MS. And then the one in Denver is the MS Centers of Excellence that CMSC, and that is solely focused on MS neurology.
